name: GHST-PRTCL
description:
FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED

GOAL

Can you survive the onslaught of endless horde of ghosts? Eliminate a specific combination of ghosts every 10 seconds to keep playing. You must eliminate the combo ghosts in order, from left to right, without touching or hitting any other ghosts in between. Otherwise, your combo will reset. To eliminate ghosts, swat them with your Cyber Broom, run against them, dive kick on them or vaporize them with your Cyber Blast.

CONTROLS

Movement – WASD  

Jump and Double Jump – Space (Hold OK)   

Attack with Cyber Broom – Left-click  

Cyber Blast – Right-click  

Divekick – S (in air)  

Wallclimb – Hold A (left wall), Hold D (right wall), Hold Space (ceiling)

TIPS

1. Try cleaning the arena a bit before eliminating combo ghosts. This makes it easier to navigate the arena.

2. Use Cyber Blast to clear the way. Eliminating ghosts with these abilities won’t reset your combo. It does have a cooldown though, so be careful!

3. Use Double Jump, Wall Climb to navigate to hard-to-reach ghosts.

4. You can collect your combo with Divekick, and it doesn't reset your combo either!
